name: Stridsvogn
description:
• Wreak havoc as you battle up to three friends with exceedingly powerful weapons
  • Use the fully destructible terrain to gain the upper hand
  • Collect the crates to get the most powerful weapons and upgrades

Play on island maps or create you own custom maps

Play with up to four players in split screen mode

Fight with crazy weaponry and upgrades

Experience the completely destructible environment

Compete on your own or as teams in several game modes

Fight with three unique tank types

  • The game supports both keyboard control and gamepads.
  • It is under development so much is subject to change.
  • Remember that this is a one-man-show + I have a day-job, so things might take a bit of time.
  • The paid version will become available in due time, I want to clear out as many bugs as possible before it releases.
Please follow me on social media for updates:
  • Twitter : @LarsGames_
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCslIyA4_1rciR3loFI09pZQ
Please give it a try and let me know what you think! :)
